ruleSearch.name: #centerm>#content>table.grid>tbody>tr>td:nth-of-type(1)>a@text
ruleSearch.author: #centerm>#content>table.grid>tbody>tr>td:nth-of-type(3)@text
ruleSearch.coverUrl:
<js>
let bookUrl = result.select("a:first-of-type").attr("href");
let bookId = bookUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\.htm/)[1];
let imageBaseUrl = "https://www.piaotia.com/files/article/image/";
let imageDetailUrl = `${parseInt(bookId / 1000)}/${bookId}/${bookId}s.jpg`;
imageBaseUrl + imageDetailUrl;
</js>

ruleExplore.name: #centerm>#content>table.grid>tbody>tr>td:nth-of-type(1)>a@text
ruleExplore.author: #centerm>#content>table.grid>tbody>tr>td:nth-of-type(3)@text
ruleExplore.coverUrl:
<js>
let bookUrl = result.select("a:first-of-type").attr("href");
let bookId = bookUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\.htm/)[1];
let imageBaseUrl = "https://www.piaotia.com/files/article/image/";
let imageDetailUrl = `${parseInt(bookId / 1000)}/${bookId}/${bookId}s.jpg`;
imageBaseUrl + imageDetailUrl;
</js>

header: {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/126.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"}
bookSourceComment:
目标书籍更新快；
详情页最新章节偶尔慢于目录页的最新章节；
发现页和搜索页均无书籍封面和书籍简介；
需要 VPN 访问以绕过 Cloudflare 的 IP 封禁；
searchUrl:
<js>cookie.removeCookie(baseUrl)</js>
/modules/article/search.php, {
    "charset": "gbk",
    "method": "POST",
    "body": "searchtype=articlename&searchkey={{key}}&action=login&submit=%26%23160%3B%CB%D1%26%23160%3B%26%23160%3B%CB%F7%26%23160%3B&page={{page}}",
    "headers": {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/126.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"}
}
exploreUrl:
